channel.title: 3D printing on Edi Liberato
channel.description: Recent content in 3D printing on Edi Liberato

item.title: Dovetail Jig Revisited
item.description: I’m revisiting my dovetail because when I was looking at Cadquery 2.

item.title: Sawing guides
item.description: The idea here is the same of my dovetail jig but now one is inteded to aid making square cuts on wood with hand saws and the other 45 degrees cut for joinery.

item.title: Dovetail Guide
item.description: This is my take on dovetail guides, I designed this to be 3d printed and parametric.

item.title: Kugelwellenhorn
item.description: I always have been intrigued by horns. Acctualy by passive devices in general, tunned mass dampers, RLC circuits to name a few.

item.title: CD organizer
item.description: I had some old CDs lying around the house and I decided to organized them in a single place.

item.title: Cadquery Turners Cube
item.description: Back in Brazil, during my machinist apprenticeship, one of the lathe tasks of the manual machining course was to make a turners cube.

item.title: Cadquery Chess Set
item.description: This is my debute 3d printing project. A chess set designed in cadquery.
